Html: Hi Friends,I am new to WPF programming, please help me out with the following Issue:The text in the TextBox are separated,, i.e, like N 23Â°23.65, here User enters N first, after that he should press Tab to edit the next field (i.e, Degrees field) and then again press tab to edit next field (minutes field)....Kindly help me...Thanks in Advance...
